verbs.description: [ARG0: Sources] [V: say] [ARG1: President Donald Trump is ordering staff to prepare for dozens of new pardons] .
Sources say President Donald Trump [V: is] ordering staff to prepare for dozens of new pardons .
Sources say [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: ordering] [ARG1: staff] [ARG2: to prepare for dozens of new pardons] .
Sources say President Donald Trump is ordering [ARG0: staff] to [V: prepare] [ARG2: for dozens of new pardons] .
